3166-2 |blank1_info =MX-BCS |blank2_name =Postal abbr. |blank2_info =B.C.S. |blank3_name = |blank3_info = |website = www.gbcs.gob.mx |footnotes = }} Baja California Sur is a state in northwest Mexico. It is on the Baja California peninsula. Its capital is La Paz. About 500,000 people live there. Its name means "South Lower California".
